alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Greeley; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 25 at 3:25PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Gusty Winds and Low Relative Humidity Sunday... .Although the relative humidity is forecasted to be slightly above criteria, wind gusts of 40-55 MPH and dry vegetation across the region cause concern for rapid fire growth. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ TO 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001...013...027...041...252...253 AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma... Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne...Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman...Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace and Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Timing...Sunday Afternoon * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...Around 60. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
